entry.title: Bitcoin Core 24.1 released
entry.summary: On May 19, 2023, Michael Ford announced the release of Bitcoin Core version 24.1 via bitcoin-dev mailing list. The new version is available for download from the official website or through BitTorrent. The BitTorrent link includes several trackers, including one with a typo in its subdomain: trakcer.bitcoin.sprovoost.nl instead of tracker.bitcoin.sprovoost.nl. Sjors noticed the error and mentioned it in a reply to the announcement email, stating that he would add the correct subdomain.
